Name: Elgato Stream Deck
Description: Elgato Stream Deck is a customizable control pad and software suite designed for streamers, content creators, and professionals. It enables users to trigger actions, launch applications, control audio/video, and automate workflows with a single touch. The Stream Deck ecosystem includes hardware devices with LCD keys and a powerful software platform for customization and integration.
Supported Platforms: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later, macOS 11 or later
System Requirements: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later / macOS 11 or later, USB 2.0 port, Internet connection for setup
Typical Use Cases: Live streaming, video production, productivity automation, macro execution, application launching, audio/video control, social media management
Key Features: Customizable LCD keys, multi-action macros, integration with OBS, Twitch, YouTube, and other platforms, plugin support, profiles and folders, drag-and-drop interface, smart profiles, action sharing, marketplace for plugins and icons, SDK for custom development
